NewsArticle.Title: West Woodlands is Open
NewsArticle.Content: Mundane explorers striking new trails through the woodlands have stumbled upon a long abandoned road. Upon following this road, they discovered a new previously un-explored area which up until now had been unreachable. In a wild and dangerous land just west of Mileth lies the abandoned village of Muc-Moor. The inhabitants are long gone, but the wild beasts still ravage the ruins of the town. The Mysteries of the land are awaiting to be discoveredÂ…....
